text: The former commandry church (now the Schlosskirche Mirow). The Commandry of Mirow was a commandry of the Knights Hospitaller, based in Mirow, a town in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern. It existed from 1226 until 1648. ==External links== *http://www.landesbibliographie-mv.de/REL?PPN=348978170 category:History of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern
title: Commandry of Mirow
